text: Julie Frances Cobb (born May 29, 1947) is an American actress. She was born in Los Angeles. Cobb's father was actor Lee J. Cobb. From 1976 to 1977, she was married to actor Victor French. From 1986 to 2005, she was married to actor James Cromwell. Her movie roles include in The Second Coming of Suzanne (1974), Fantasy Island (1978), Just You and Me, Kid (1979), The Runnin' Kind (1989), Lisa (1990), Defending Your Life (1991) and Dr. Jekyll and Ms. Hyde (1995). She also appeared in the TV movie versions of Salem's Lot (1979) and Brave New World (1980). She also starred in Arthur Miller's play After the Fall. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1947 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles
title: Julie Cobb
